steps.name: Send POST request to /api/v1/orders to create a new order

parameters.name: order
parameters.value: Order{firstName='AqlQsndbfN', lastName='hmMBJVKold', address='rPitRZzZX2', metroStation='Комсомольская', phone='+76599259100', rentTime=4, deliveryDate='2021-12-25', comment='qJWVJApzsP', colors=null}

steps.name: Send GET request to /api/v1/orders to get order id by track = 967559
Send POST request to /api/v1/courier to create a new courier
Send POST request to /api/v1/courier/login to login
Send PUT request to /api/v1/orders/accept/: to accept the order by a courier with ID = 22018
Send DELETE request to /api/v1/courier/:id to remove the courier with ID = 22018
